translation.en: ♪ What a fool I was To sit and watch you go ♪
[newsreader] Chinese health authorities are still working to identify the virus
behind a pneumonia outbreak in the central city of Wuhan.
translation.zh: ‎武汉城中心爆发肺炎疫情背后的病毒

translation.en: [Trump] We have it totally under control. One person, coming in from China.
translation.zh:
‎我们已经控制住了
‎是一个从中国入境的人

translation.en: Whatever happens, we're totally prepared. We have the best people in the world.
translation.zh:
‎我们已做好预备
‎我们有世上最好的人才

translation.en: [female newsreader] There is increasing evidence of community spread
translation.zh: ‎越来越多的证据显示社区传染

translation.en: with more cases reported every hour.
[man] The whole world needs to be on alert now.
translation.zh: ‎现在全世界都需要保持警惕

translation.en: The whole world needs to take action
and be ready for… for any cases that come.
translation.zh: ‎为即将到来的任何情况做好准备

translation.en: Basically, we're saying, wash your hands, uh, business as usual.
translation.zh: ‎基本上 我们说 要洗手 照常营业

translation.en: WHO has been assessing this outbreak around the clock,
translation.zh: ‎世卫组织一直在全天候评估这次疫情

translation.en: and we're deeply concerned
both by the alarming levels of spread and severity
and by the alarming levels of inaction.
translation.zh: ‎及令人震惊的无所作为深感担忧

translation.en: We have therefore made the assessment
that COVID-19 can be characterized as a pandemic.
translation.zh: ‎认为新冠肺炎可被定性为大流行病

translation.en: [man in Chinese] When I woke up this morning
I saw some messages that medical staff in Wuhan
translation.zh: ‎我看到有信息说武汉医务人员

translation.en: urgently needed volunteers
to help them commute to work.
After the lockdown, the government didn't solve the commuting issue.
translation.zh: ‎因为封城后政府没有解决交通问题

translation.en: So, I volunteered right away.
translation.zh: ‎所以我第一时间我就加入了志愿者

translation.en: Now I'm going to pick up the first medic.
translation.zh: ‎现在我准备去接送第一个医护人员

translation.en: Although it's Chinese New Year's Eve,
the whole city is really quiet.
It doesn't feel like New Year.
-Thank you. -No worries.
You get up so early.
-[Wenhua sighs] -What time did you go to sleep?
[Wenhua] I slept for one hour last night.
translation.zh: ‎我昨天只睡了一个小时都不到

translation.en: [woman] Thank you so much.
[woman] I don't know when this is going to end,
translation.zh: ‎这也不知道会封到什么时候

translation.en: because the situation is still getting worse.
-[Wenhua] Still getting worse? -Yes.
The confirmed cases are still going up every day.
translation.zh: ‎因为每天的确诊人数在不断地增加

translation.en: The number of deaths is going up.
I just remembered, I brought you an N95 face mask.
translation.zh: ‎对了 我给你拿了个N95的口罩

translation.en: -I'll just leave it here. -Thank you.
[woman] It's here. Thank you. Go and have some rest.
translation.zh:
‎就这里
‎谢谢你 你好好保重

translation.en: Okay, no problem.
-Thank you. -Okay, bye!
[Wenhua] This is alcohol.
I'm going to a friend's place
translation.zh: ‎我现在准备去一个朋友的家里

translation.en: as we can't spend New Year with our families in Wuhan.
translation.zh:
‎我们俩都是因为家人
‎这次没法来武汉跟我们一起过年

translation.en: Happy New Year! Let's have a toast!
This is how people in Wuhan eat a Chinese New Year festive dinner.
translation.zh: ‎看看武汉人是怎么过年吃年饭的

translation.en: [laughing] Very unique.
This one is really delicious.
[man in Farsi] This is a frightening time.
Look after yourself and your family.
Don't count on the government. They don't care.
translation.zh: ‎不要指望政府 他们不在乎

translation.en: And they don't have the infrastructure or money to help you.
translation.zh: ‎他们也没有基础设施或资金来帮助你

translation.en: Oh, what's going on? You're just getting the fruit.
[laughing] The doctor is ready for surgery.
Well, please let me have your heart.
-What a situation! -Nothing should touch anything.
translation.zh:
‎-什么情况！
‎-谁也别碰任何东西

translation.en: How long do these need to be outside?
We should read about that, I don't know!
translation.zh: ‎我们该了解一下 我不知道！

translation.en: Farah wrote:
[in English] "People here are also in panic mode in regards to the virus."
translation.zh: ‎“这里的人也对这种病毒感到惊慌”

translation.en: [in Farsi] Is she in Lebanon?
[in English] "We have cases and the government, of course,
translation.zh: ‎“我们有了病例 当然 政府

translation.en: is not well-equipped to manage any kind of crisis."
translation.zh: ‎没有能力应对任何类型的危机”

translation.en: -[in Farsi] Exactly the same as Iran. -I know.
Today, through a video link, the Pope requested prayers
translation.zh: ‎今天 通过视频链接 教皇

translation.en: for those who are ill and for the virus to come to an end.
translation.zh: ‎要求为生病的人祈祷 并让病毒消失

translation.en: [male reporter in Farsi] The Pope has also prayed for all the doctors and nurses at the hospitals
translation.zh: ‎教皇还为在医院里战斗前线的

translation.en: who are on the front line of this battle.
[Mohammad] It's as if something is slipping through your fingers…
translation.zh: ‎好像有什么从你的指缝间溜走

translation.en: and you have to hold on to it.
I miss people.
A lot.
It's all so uncertain, with no end in sight.
translation.zh: ‎一切都那么不确定 看不到尽头

translation.en: No one knows how long we are supposed to stay in quarantine.
translation.zh: ‎没有人知道我们应该隔离多久

translation.en: But…
somehow…
I know it will pass.
We'll somehow get through this.
translation.zh: ‎无论如何 我们会度过难关的

translation.en: [in English] It's quite surreal.
Dystopian.
Get us some of that green stuff.
-Farah, look at this beautiful tree. -It's so beautiful.
translation.zh:
‎-法拉 看这棵美丽的树
‎-太美了

translation.en: This won't do much, but…
you know…
we try.
People bought all the masks.
-It's better than nothing. -Better than nothing.
[female reporter] London, adjusting to day four
translation.zh:
‎（国家需要您加入抗击病毒的行列） ‎伦敦 适应着
‎前所未有的全国封锁第四天

translation.en: of an unprecedented countrywide lockdown
translation.zh:
‎伦敦 适应着
‎前所未有的全国封锁第四天

translation.en: and worrying news that the Prime Minister has tested positive for the coronavirus.
translation.zh:
‎及令人担忧
‎总理冠状病毒检测呈阳性的消息

translation.en: I've developed mild symptoms of the coronavirus.
translation.zh: ‎我出现了冠状病毒的轻微症状

translation.en: That's to say a temperature and a persistent cough.
[female reporter] The Health Secretary revealed he was also showing symptoms.
translation.zh: ‎卫生部长透露他也出现了症状

translation.en: [Hassan] I want to help because I--
Because I feel like I can do this. It's not my first crisis.
translation.zh:
‎因为我觉得我能做到
‎这不是我的第一次危机

translation.en: I have sent over 100 applications so far to every company that is still running.
translation.zh:
‎目前 我已向每家仍在
‎运营的公司发送了100多份申请

translation.en: Just applied to be a hospital support staff.
translation.zh: ‎我刚申请成为医院的支援人员

translation.en: The most in demand is that they're looking for hospital domestic assistants.
translation.zh: ‎需求最高的职位是医院事务助理

translation.en: This is quite intense. Hospital porter.
translation.zh: ‎这相当吃力 医院搬运工

translation.en: You have to be taking bodies to and from the morgue.
And… there's no way I could do that. [laughs]
doing the cleaning and, and…
disinfecting and…
and wiping surfaces is, uh…
But it will be good.
Oh, wow, I just got a reply. [laughs]
Live.
It's crazy times, but we'll see, we'll see what happens.
translation.zh:
‎这是疯狂的时代
‎但我们会看看会发生什么事

translation.en: -[in Arabic] Hassan, I love you. -[in Arabic] I love you too.
[Hassan in English] I just applied to be a cleaner at the hospital.
No. You are gonna be a farmer.
-It's way cooler. -Well, they could-- [chuckles]
I know farming is cool, but it's whoever gets back to me first.
translation.zh: ‎我知道农业很酷 但要看谁先回复我

translation.en: No, let's be-- You be a farmer and then we can…
translation.zh:
‎不 我们…
‎你做农夫然后我们可以

translation.en: eat fruit and, like, be in a farm.
translation.zh: ‎吃水果 就像在农场里一样

translation.en: It's way better than cleaning.
Whoever gets back to me first,
-I'll take it. -Okay.
[female reporter in Portuguese] Panic is spreading
translation.zh:
‎（帕拉索波利斯贫民窟
‎圣保罗 巴西） ‎恐慌在贫民窟居民中蔓延

translation.en: amongst favela residents, who live in fear
of the devastation that the pandemic could bring
to their overcrowded communities, long ignored by the government.
translation.zh:
‎可能会给长期被政府忽视
‎过度拥挤的社区带来破坏

translation.en: Let's go!
Let's go!
Second on the right, isn't it?
[Renata in Portuguese] Paraisópolis is one of the biggest favelas
translation.zh:
‎帕拉伊索波利斯
‎是圣保罗最大的贫民窟之一

translation.en: in Sao Paolo with a population of 100,000 people.
translation.zh:
‎帕拉伊索波利斯
‎是圣保罗最大的贫民窟之一 ‎拥有十万人口

translation.en: It's there, where the guy's waving.
translation.zh: ‎就在那里 那家伙挥手的地方

translation.en: Until now we never had a reliable ambulance service.
translation.zh:
‎到目前为止
‎我们从未有过可信赖的救护车服务

translation.en: Get the oxygen!
Easy.
-[sobbing and coughing] -I'll put him straight on oxygen.
I know it's unnerving,
but you need to stay calm.
Honey, get his ID, because we're taking him in, okay?
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 拿他的身份证
‎因为我们要送他入院 好吗？

translation.en: -[man continues coughing] -Igor, stay calm.
Come on, enjoy the oxygen.
[Renata] The week that the pandemic exploded here in Paraisópolis,
translation.zh:
‎疫情在帕拉伊索波利斯
‎爆发的那一周

translation.en: I had sinusitis and was at home taking medication.
translation.zh: ‎我得了鼻窦炎 在家中服药

translation.en: Staying home and doing nothing was bothering me.
translation.zh:
‎呆在家里
‎什么都不做让我很困扰

translation.en: -[man] Can I go? -[Renata] Go. You wait there, man!
translation.zh:
‎-我能走吗？
‎-走吧 你等着吧！

translation.en: [Renata] Go, put your foot down!
So, I became the ambulance GPS navigator.
translation.zh: ‎我成了救护车全球定位系统导航器

translation.en: Because I know all the alleys, the corners, the streets,
translation.zh: ‎因为我知道所有的小巷 角落 街道

translation.en: and I know the people here because of my work in the community.
translation.zh:
‎也因为我在社区工作
‎所以认识这里的人

translation.en: [woman] I've got an 87-year-old patient.
He's very weak with body aches.
Okay, I'm on my way.
-Thank you. -Pleasure, bye.
[Renata] I don't think there's anyone better for this job than me.
translation.zh: ‎我认为没人比我更适合这份工作

translation.en: -[in English] Hey, man. Anything pending? -What's going on?
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 老兄 还有未处理的事吗？
‎-你还好吗？

translation.en: -One patient in bed 17. -Okay.
Hello, how are you? I'm Dr. Henderson.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 你好吗？我是亨德森医生

translation.en: Any shortness of breath? Any problems breathing?
translation.zh: ‎有没有呼吸困难？呼吸有问题吗？

translation.en: No. Okay, all right.
[Dr. Henderson] I think my entire life
has been a training exercise for
translation.zh: ‎都在为正在发生的所有灾难

translation.en: all of the disaster that's going on.
-[patient coughs] -[man translates in Spanish]
-All right. Shortness of breath? -Sí.
[Dr. Henderson] The pandemic has taught me
that if you stay ready, you don't have to get ready.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们做好准备 就不必准备

translation.en: Because I am a doctor, because I deal with crisis,
translation.zh: ‎因为我是医生 因为我处理危机

translation.en: because I know of the inequities that exist within our systems…
translation.zh: ‎因为我知道制度中存在不平等现象…

translation.en: I pretty much have prepared myself for like worst-case scenarios.
translation.zh: ‎我已为最坏情况做好充分准备

translation.en: Yeah. He's likely gonna need surgery and fast, but you know…
translation.zh: ‎是 他可能需要赶快动手术 但…

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah. -Okay.
I just wanted to make sure I communicated that with you.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想确保我与你沟通过

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
-Okay, you have a good day. -Have a good day.
translation.zh:
‎-祝你有美好的一天
‎-祝你有美好的一天

translation.en: -All right bye. -Bye.
[woman on radio] The scale of the crisis is growing.
The government needs to get a grip on this situation
as it's getting out of control.
If they let it carry on, we'll end up like Elmhurst Hospital in New York.
translation.zh:
‎如果他们放任不管 我们最终
‎会像纽约的埃尔姆赫斯特医院一样

translation.en: They haven't taken nearly the steps--
[Dr. Henderson] I kind of try to leave whatever happened at work at work,
translation.zh: ‎我试着抽离工作中所发生的一切

translation.en: but when I look at the response of the government,
translation.zh: ‎但是当我看到政府的反应时

translation.en: it kind of makes me angry.
Um, it's scary, to see all these people come in--
translation.zh: ‎真可怕 看到这么多人进来…

translation.en: -And they're younger now? -They're younger, they're sicker…
translation.zh:
‎-现在来的年龄更年轻了？
‎-他们更年轻 病得更重…

translation.en: At our hospital, you know, cancer…
translation.zh: ‎在我们医院 癌症… ‎（大卫福斯特医生 阿门的朋友）

translation.en: Um, it's an eye hospital, so it's a referral center,
translation.zh: ‎…这是一家眼科医院和转诊中心

translation.en: so, we had a lot of that stuff going on,
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们有很多类似的病例

translation.en: but that dropped off, and of course we had an increase in COVID patients.
translation.zh:
‎但那下降了
‎而我们的新冠肺炎患者有所增加

translation.en: This is crazy. It's not gonna end in the foreseeable future. For sure.
translation.zh:
‎这太疯狂了
‎在可预见的未来 也不会结束

translation.en: -Dad? Look! -The most stressful thing about work…
is, like, pronouncing people dead. You know, like walking into the room?
translation.zh: ‎就是走进房间 宣告人死了？

translation.en: The first time you do it in residency is like, "Oh, my goodness."
translation.zh:
‎第一次当住院医生时
‎做的“我的天啊”

translation.en: Yeah. It's the biggest thing.
This is a person who was alive a minute ago.
And now they're not. And you go in there.
translation.zh: ‎但现在他死了 然后你走进去

translation.en: You're pronouncing them, you… checking off the criteria.
translation.zh:
‎你在宣告死亡 你…
‎检验指标

translation.en: No chest rises. No pupillary response, no pulse.
translation.zh: ‎胸部没有上升 无瞳孔反应 无脉搏

translation.en: No pain response and it's just really sad
translation.zh: ‎无疼痛反应 这真的很难过 因为

translation.en: because this person died alone with no family members.
translation.zh: ‎无疼痛反应 这真的很难过 因为 ‎这人在没有家人的情况下独自死去

translation.en: And prior to this, I rarely pronounced anybody dead.
translation.zh: ‎这人在没有家人的情况下独自死去 ‎而在此之前 我很少为病人宣告死亡

translation.en: And now, you know, it's one or two a night.
I think on Sunday, I think might have pronounced four people dead. You know?
translation.zh: ‎周日那天 我想可能已宣布四人死亡

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] It sucks, man. I don't want to become stoic to it.
translation.zh: ‎糟透了 我不想变得麻木不仁

translation.en: You know what I mean? [Dr. Henderson's wife] I was just gonna say that.
translation.zh:
‎-明白我的意思吗？
‎-我刚就想说那个

translation.en: [man on speaker] Attention, please.
An emergency state has been activated
due to the coronavirus.
[in Chinese] This is Wuhan railway station after lockdown.
♪ Well, I've been out walking ♪
[Wenhua] Like science fiction.
♪ I don't do too much talking these days ♪
My goodness, it's like the end of the world.
♪ These days ♪
[in English] I can't stress enough how insane this is.
♪ These days I seem to think a lot ♪
♪ About the things That I forgot to do ♪
[Hassan] It's like a ghost town.
♪ Please don't confront me With my failures ♪
translation.zh: ‎请别要我面对我的失败 ‎（我们将共同渡过难关）

translation.en: ♪ I have not forgotten them ♪
-This is the first interview, by the way. -[female interviewer] Yes!
translation.zh:
‎- 顺便说一下 这是第一次采访
‎-是的！

translation.en: So, it's good that I'm doing it with my continent.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我和我的大陆一起做很好

translation.en: [female interviewer] I know! I've been monitoring.
[female interviewer] Dr. Tedros, is the institution, the WHO,
translation.zh:
‎（总干事
‎世界卫生组织） ‎谭德塞 博士
‎世界卫生组织

translation.en: up to the task to assist the world to deal with this pandemic?
translation.zh:
‎是否能胜任协助世界
‎应对这流行病的任务？

translation.en: [Dr. Tedros] We declared emergency, global emergency,
translation.zh:
‎我们宣布进入紧急状态
‎全球紧急情况

translation.en: this is the highest level actually, by January 30.
translation.zh:
‎截至1月30日
‎这实际上是最高水平

translation.en: Most countries were not affected. And those who were at…
translation.zh:
‎大多数国家没有受到影响
‎而那些在…

translation.en: I was so worried, because after visiting China in late January,
translation.zh:
‎我很担心 因为
‎在一月下旬访问中国后

translation.en: I was saying the virus is public enemy number one,
it's a dangerous virus,
but there is a window of opportunity. Let's do our best.
translation.zh: ‎但还有机会 我们尽力而为吧

translation.en: In February, in early March.
But, we are…
where we are.
[man] The situation is really scary right now. People need to stay home.
translation.zh: ‎情况极其可怕 人们必须待在家里

translation.en: We've said many times, "Stay home if you feel sick."
translation.zh:
‎我们说过多次
‎“如果您身体不适 请留在家中”

translation.en: We have adapted… We have modified that to say,
translation.zh:
‎我们已适应了…
‎我们已改成说

translation.en: "Stay home if you're unwell and call your medical provider."
translation.zh:
‎“如果您身体不适 请留在家中
‎并致电您的医疗服务者”

translation.en: [man] Just tell me what I'm saying.
translation.zh: ‎我看看你能理解我的意思吗

translation.en: "Stay home if you're sick." If you have symptoms.
translation.zh:
‎“如果您身体不适 请留在家中”
‎如果你有症状

translation.en: [man] That's what it says.
Are we sure there will be a vaccine?
We will do everything to have a vaccine, but--
translation.zh: ‎我们会尽一切努力研发疫苗 但是…

translation.en: It's that so many "ifs" have to go right to get one.
translation.zh:
‎当中需要超越太多的“假设”
‎才能得到有效的

translation.en: We all want one, right? I mean, that's no question, but we--
translation.zh:
‎我们都想要 对吧？
‎那是毫无疑问的 但是我们…

translation.en: There's no guarantee that there will be one.
[Dr. Tedros] So, can we check that first part?
translation.zh: ‎那么 我们能否检查第一部分？

translation.en: "We all want this to be over. We all want to get on with our lives."
translation.zh:
‎“我们都希望这一切结束
‎我们都想继续我们的生活

translation.en: "But the hard reality is this is not even close to being over."
translation.zh: ‎但现实情况离结束还有很大距离”

translation.en: That's pretty strong. Everyone happy with that?
translation.zh: ‎很强烈的用词 大家同意吗？

translation.en: [woman] It's pretty strong.
[Dr. Tedros] Some people call it, "we're in the eye of the storm."
translation.zh: ‎有人称之为“我们正处于风暴眼中”

translation.en: It's true, because we're coordinating the response.
translation.zh: ‎这是真的 因为我们再协调应对

translation.en: So, now the only option for an endgame is to develop the vaccine.
translation.zh:
‎所以 现在要达到疫情最后阶段
‎的唯一选择是开发疫苗

translation.en: The fastest vaccine that's ever been developed before was a mumps vaccine
and that took four years.
It's not the kind of a pressure of some search.
The pressure really is just to make sure that we're trying to remove barriers
translation.zh: ‎那压力是确保我们努力消除

translation.en: that would slow us down,
trying to do everything all at the same time,
and working out how we can do that without getting any of it wrong.
translation.zh: ‎并找出我们如何做到准确无误

translation.en: We started with a technology that we already know is safe to use,
translation.zh:
‎我们从一项我们已经知道
‎可安全使用的技术开始

translation.en: and we already know how to manufacture it,
and we already know what dose we want to use,
translation.zh: ‎我们也已知道我们要使用多少剂量

translation.en: and that it will induce good immune responses.
translation.zh: ‎它才会诱导良好的免疫反应

translation.en: That saved us a lot of time.
translation.zh: ‎这节省了我们的时间 ‎（未来之架子）

translation.en: Afternoon, everyone. It's been quite a challenging day today.
translation.zh: ‎下午好 今天真是充满挑战的一天 ‎（临床试验）

translation.en: We've had a number of issues that have come up,
both in the clinic and in manufacturing, which we'll go through.
translation.zh: ‎临床及制造方面所遇到的问题

translation.en: My role is to start the whole process.
It's also my role to raise all the money to do this.
translation.zh: ‎同时 筹集资金也是我的职责

translation.en: There are public health problems to solve, but there's not a lot of money in it.
translation.zh:
‎我们有待解决的公共卫生问题
‎但没有资金

translation.en: [man] There's been two SUSARs reported today.
translation.zh:
‎今天有两宗
‎疑似意外严重不良反应的报告

translation.en: Which is an individual that 48 hours after vaccination had a temperature of 40.5.
translation.zh:
‎有一人在接种疫苗48小时后
‎体温达到40.5

translation.en: It's definitely related to vaccination.
[Prof. Gilbert] The difficulty for all vaccine developers
is that we don't know how strong that immune response needs to be
translation.zh: ‎在于我们不知道免疫反应需要多强

translation.en: to protect against this particular infection,
because we don't have vaccines against of the other human coronaviruses.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们没有针对
‎其他冠状病毒的疫苗

translation.en: That process for other diseases can take years, right?
translation.zh:
‎其他疾病的研发疫苗过程
‎可能需要数年时间 对吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -So, we're crushing this down--
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-所以 我们将其压缩…

translation.en: -Days. Hours. -Yeah.
[Dr. Tedros] You know, from not knowing the virus, we started to know the virus.
translation.zh:
‎从不了解病毒
‎直到我们开始了解病毒

translation.en: And what makes me sad is when the politics fails,
translation.zh: ‎让我难过的是当政治失败时

translation.en: even the technical knowledge doesn't work.
We cannot stop this pandemic if we don't know who is infected.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们不知道感染者是谁
‎就无法阻止这种流行病

translation.en: We have a simple message for all countries.
translation.zh: ‎我们要向所有国家传达一个简单讯息

translation.en: Test, test, test.
[Mohammad in Farsi] Come check that fever you thought I had.
translation.zh: ‎快来检查你认为在发烧的我

translation.en: My body started heating up after breakfast.
The moment we hugged, I felt like you had a fever.
translation.zh: ‎我们拥抱的那一刻我感觉你发烧了

translation.en: I'm hot. I've been feeling hot for a while.
translation.zh: ‎我很热 这种感觉已持续一段时间了

translation.en: Whenever you hug me, you say you feel heat.
translation.zh: ‎每当你拥抱我时 都说你觉得热

translation.en: It's coming from within.
[female voice recording] Tehran Emergency Center.
Press one for any questions about coronavirus.
translation.zh: ‎有关冠状病毒的任何问题请按一

translation.en: I can feel something happening.
Doctor, I would like to talk about my symptoms with you.
translation.zh: ‎医生 我想和你谈谈我的症状

translation.en: Last night, whether it was a panic attack or whatever,
translation.zh: ‎昨晚 不管是惊恐发作还是什么的

translation.en: I felt like I wasn't getting oxygen for a few minutes.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉我有几分钟没有氧气

translation.en: [male doctor] Have you had a fever?
No fever.
-[doctor] Any coughs? -No coughs either, none at all.
translation.zh:
‎-咳嗽呢？
‎-也没有 完全没有

translation.en: [doctor] Most of your symptoms are related
to your esophagus and gastric acid reflux.
The rest of your symptoms, from what you told me,
translation.zh: ‎你其余的症状 根据你告诉我的

translation.en: are related to stress and anxiety.
-[man] How's that? -Perfect! Keep still!
That's very beautiful!
It's your New Year's present.
It's really beautiful, truly.
♪ Kiss me ♪
♪ Kiss me ♪
♪ For one last time ♪
♪ And forever ♪
♪ As I'm in search of my destiny ♪
[woman in Chinese] Three bodies have been lying here all morning.
translation.zh: ‎三具尸体 整个上午都躺在这里

translation.en: Some of them died in the middle of the night.
But until now, nobody has come to sort things.
translation.zh: ‎但直到现在 都没人来处理

translation.en: Doctors and nurses are all working under these conditions.
translation.zh: ‎医生和护士都在这样的环境下工作

translation.en: [Wenhua] I am very worried about my family, friends,
translation.zh: ‎我非常担心我的亲人 朋友

translation.en: and everyone who lives in the city.
translation.zh: ‎以及生活在这座城市里的所有人

translation.en: [man in video] Okay, you have seen him. Just keep going.
translation.zh: ‎好 你见过他了 继续往前走

translation.en: [Wenhua] I just read some messages in our volunteer group
translation.zh:
‎我刚在一个爱心接送医护人员
‎的群里面看到有消息说

translation.en: that someone in the Han Yang group got infected.
translation.zh: ‎在汉阳那边的群里面发生了感染事件

translation.en: At the moment,
we don't know if it's a driver or a medic that got infected.
translation.zh:
‎我现在还不知道是司机
‎还是医护人员感染了

translation.en: But they are stopping…
all picking up of medical staff to avoid it spreading.
translation.zh: ‎要停止接送这些医护人员以免扩散

translation.en: [in English] Check this out. NHS badge.
translation.zh: ‎看这个 国民保健署证章

translation.en: Yes! [chuckles]
Domestic assistant.
It looks fake, but it's actually true.
translation.zh: ‎看起来像假的 但其实是真的

translation.en: Look at that. Never been prouder of a badge in my life.
translation.zh:
‎看那个
‎我一生中从未为证章感到自豪

translation.en: See how it goes.
[woman] Where is Louise?
[Hassan] COVID-19 ward. No entry, no visitors.
translation.zh: ‎新冠肺炎病房 禁止进入 禁止访客

translation.en: It's quite scary. Just arriving to the ward itself is quite intimidating.
translation.zh: ‎太可怕了 去到病房本身就很吓人

translation.en: So, the very first thing is taking out all the contaminated rubbish.
translation.zh: ‎第一件事就是清除所有受污染的垃圾

translation.en: It's an invisible enemy. So, I am quite petrified.
translation.zh:
‎它是隐形的敌人
‎所以 我有点吓呆了

translation.en: All this is coming from the patients.
-All this needs to be cleaned? -That's it.
translation.zh:
‎-这些都需要清理吗？
‎-就是这样

translation.en: Clean this down.
This one. You take that one.
When you're finished, you put that one some place.
translation.zh: ‎你完成后 把那个放在某个地方

translation.en: Okay.
[Hassan] Albert helps me a lot.
Every day his words are, "Hassan, protect yourself and your family."
translation.zh:
‎每天他都说
‎“哈桑 保护好自己和家人

translation.en: "Wear your PPE. Wash your hands, Hassan."
translation.zh:
‎穿上你的个人防护装备
‎洗手 哈桑”

translation.en: I have to do my job right.
Because when I'm cleaning,
I am protecting the doctors and the nurses,
and I'm also making sure that the patients
are in a clean and disinfected environment.
translation.zh: ‎处于清洁及已消毒的环境中

translation.en: So far, I've done three shifts at the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎目前 我在医院完成了三次轮班

translation.en: It's a shit show. That's the best I can describe it.
translation.zh:
‎那是个可怕的情况
‎我已尽力形容得最好

translation.en: Found out that 400 staff members are sick.
And everyone, literally everyone, is coughing right and left.
translation.zh: ‎几乎每个人 都在到处咳嗽

translation.en: Um… Nurses are stretched.
The nurses on my ward are…
Like, they've done 60 hours a week.
translation.zh: ‎就好像他们做了一周60小时的工

translation.en: They're frustrated, they're tired…
and they have absolutely no idea what's going on.
translation.zh: ‎他们也完全不知道这是怎么回事

translation.en: [in Spanish] We've been waiting since 11:00 p.m.
translation.zh: ‎我们从晚上11点开始一直在等待

translation.en: So many of us have been waiting here like this, and they say there is no help.
translation.zh:
‎我们这么多人一直这样在这里等着
‎他们却说无法帮忙

translation.en: They say there are no doctors.
[crying] We're…
It's been awful. It's not fair, what we're experiencing.
translation.zh: ‎太糟糕了 我们不值得被如此对待

translation.en: We're in a really bad situation. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我们的处境非常糟糕 抱歉

translation.en: [in Spanish] The worst is knocking on our doors saying, "Here I am!"
translation.zh:
‎最糟糕的是
‎敲我们的门说“我在这里！”

translation.en: I believe fear triggers three reactions:
translation.zh: ‎我相信恐惧会引发三种反应

translation.en: The first is to paralyze you.
The second is to run away.
And the last is to confront it.
My Teletubby costume is ready.
translation.zh: ‎我的天线宝宝服装准备好了

translation.en: [sighs] I'm old.
COVID-19 INTENSIVE CARE UNIT
We need to take her off the ventilator
and replace it with a nasal cannula.
-On this side, there are four patients. -Yes.
One of them is a new mother, who is no longer on oxygen.
translation.zh: ‎当中有个新手妈妈 她不再需要吸氧

translation.en: I know who she is.
She has to be transferred to this side.
Because on this side, I need to transfer a stable patient
translation.zh:
‎因为在这一边
‎我需要转移一个稳定的病人

translation.en: so I can put another patient on a ventilator.
translation.zh:
‎这样我就可以
‎给另一个病人换上呼吸机

translation.en: This transfer requires more staff.
translation.zh: ‎这种转移需要更多医护人员

translation.en: Okay, so…
[Dr. Lopez in Spanish] I have a young team, but I'm not that young.
translation.zh:
‎我有个年轻的团队
‎但我没那么年轻

translation.en: I'm 55 years old, and this year I'll turn 56,
translation.zh: ‎我55岁 今年将年满56岁 但是

translation.en: but regardless, I do my shifts.
I cannot tell them to go home and I'll stay behind.
translation.zh: ‎我不能叫他们留下来然后我回家

translation.en: But it's 11:00 a.m.
Are you aware of all the material that is infecting the staff in here?
translation.zh: ‎你知道感染这里员工的所有材料吗？

translation.en: You're doing an important job here.
Extremely important and necessary. That's why we need you.
translation.zh:
‎非常重要及必要
‎所以我们很需要你

translation.en: I know you're scared. So are we. Don't doubt it!
translation.zh: ‎我知道你害怕 我们也是 别怀疑！

translation.en: Everyone working here is scared, because we all have family.
translation.zh:
‎在这里工作的每个人都很害怕
‎因为我们都有家人

translation.en: Especially you, because one of your colleagues died.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是你 因为你的一个同事死了

translation.en: That's why we want to protect ourselves.
But you cannot be three hours late.
In three hours, everything ends up like this.
translation.zh: ‎在三小时里 一切会变成这样

translation.en: And right now, your lateness puts everyone at risk.
translation.zh:
‎而现在 你的迟到
‎让每个人都处于危险之中

translation.en: You and us.
And if we get ill,
or when someone else gets sick, no one will be able to treat you.
translation.zh: ‎或其他人病了 就没人可以医治你

translation.en: In this game, if we don't play our part,
translation.zh:
‎在这场比赛中 如果我们不
‎严守自己的角色

translation.en: we're doomed. Okay? Good.
translation.zh: ‎我们就完了 知道吗？ 很好

translation.en: [woman] We've never had this many patients.
translation.zh: ‎我们从来没有过这么多病人

translation.en: [man] It got worse last night.
[woman] If the curve was flattening, we wouldn't be in this situation.
translation.zh:
‎如果曲线变平
‎我们不会处于这种情况

translation.en: People should come here to really see what happens
when you don't do your part and stay at home.
translation.zh: ‎当你不尽责任呆在家的后果

translation.en: I've never seen so many people dying at the same time. Not like this.
translation.zh:
‎我从未见过这么多人同时死去
‎没有像这样的

translation.en: Not only that, but also how they suddenly become critical.
translation.zh:
‎不仅如此 还有他们
‎是如何突然变得严重

translation.en: So quick. There is no way to save them.
translation.zh: ‎非常快 要救他们是不可能了

translation.en: Because, on top of everything, this pandemic exposed failures
translation.zh:
‎因为 最重要得是
‎这次大流行暴露了

translation.en: in public education and health.
translation.zh: ‎在公共教育和卫生方面的失败

translation.en: Because with education, people would have been more careful.
translation.zh: ‎因为有了教育 人们会更加小心

translation.en: This is the poor side of Peru.
Hi.
Hi, Aldair!
How is he doing?
He can be lifted up a bit.
He's too low. Shall I help you?
To lift him up?
Hi, Aldair.
How are you doing?
So-so?
Yes? I see. Okay.
Good. A bit higher.
Push up with your legs. One, two, three. Well done.
translation.zh:
‎用你的腿向上推
‎一 二 三 做得好

translation.en: There you go.
-Has he had a fever? -Pardon?
-Has he had a fever? -Yes, in the morning.
[female reporter in Hindi] With one of the worst testing rates in the world,
translation.zh: ‎拥有世界上最差的检测率之一

translation.en: medical experts are concerned that official government figures
translation.zh: ‎医学专家担心政府官方数据

translation.en: are dramatically under-reporting coronavirus deaths in India.
translation.zh: ‎严重低估了印度的冠状病毒死亡人数

translation.en: [Nupur] As the days are getting closer…
[Mohit] Don't get tense.
I am nervous and tense.
[in English] How things will happen, current situation in Delhi.
translation.zh: ‎事情将如何 德里的现状

translation.en: [doctor] So, how have you been?
I've been good. Okay. At times good, at times okay.
translation.zh: ‎我很好 没事 有时好 有时还行

translation.en: And, what about the baby?
Baby's also moving.
Daytime, a little, I think. I don't feel the movement.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得白天有一下
‎我感觉不到动静

translation.en: -But nighttime, the baby moves. -That means the baby's active.
translation.zh:
‎-但在晚上 宝宝会动
‎-那表示宝宝很活跃

translation.en: Yeah, baby's active.
That's also good. I think the baby was upside down?
translation.zh: ‎那也很好 我觉得宝宝是倒着的？

translation.en: -Yes. Oh, okay. -It was breeched.
So, we will have to repeat the ultrasound
translation.zh: ‎那么 我们不得不重复超声波

translation.en: and see whether the baby has turned around or not.
[Nupur] Okay.
[doctor] And then only we will decide what the mode of delivery is going to be.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们才能决定接生方式

translation.en: The next visit, probably may be, you know,
giving a better insight as to how things are.
-Please avoid going outside. -No, we won't.
translation.zh:
‎-请避免外出
‎-不 我们不会的

translation.en: [doctor] Don't expose yourself to this pandemic.
translation.zh: ‎不要让自己暴露在这种流行病中

translation.en: -Thank you. -Welcome. Take care.
-[Mohit] We'll visit next week, right? -[doctor] Yes, with the reports.
translation.zh:
‎-我们下星期再见？
‎-是的 和报告一起

translation.en: [Mohit] Are you okay?
[Nupur] I am really scared inside.
[female voice in Chinese] The door is open, please pick up the parcel.
Please close the door after, thank you.
[Wenhua] Since we can't pick up medical staff any more,
translation.zh: ‎因为我们不能再去接送医护人员

translation.en: I've volunteered to deliver medicines to those in need.
I hope this is safer.
I am on the way to Wugang Hospital.
translation.zh: ‎我现在在来到这个武钢总医院的路上

translation.en: Almost there.
[woman on speaker] Okay, I will wait outside the gate.
translation.zh: ‎哦行 那我在大门口等你

translation.en: I will contact you when I arrive at the gate.
Okay, bye.
Are you Hu Zhigou's wife?
Who is using this medicine?
-[woman] My husband. -Is he infected?
translation.zh:
‎-我老公
‎-他现在是有感染了吗？

translation.en: [woman] He's a serious case.
-He's a serious case. -[Wenhua] A serious case?
Are the rest of you okay?
[woman] Just okay.
So, is he in the hospital?
[woman] Yes.
[Wenhua] Do you need a ride?
[woman] I'm almost there.
It's still hard.
[Wenhua] How is his treatment now?
translation.zh: ‎他现在接受治疗的情况怎么样？

translation.en: [woman] He's a little bit better now. This is the scan from before.
translation.zh: ‎他现在好一些 你看他之前的片子

translation.en: Those areas of the lung are all infected. Four parts all have an issue.
translation.zh:
‎肺部的这些区域都被感染了
‎四个部分都是有问题

translation.en: [Wenhua] Oh, my goodness!
What is his treatment at the moment?
translation.zh: ‎他现在用什么方式在治疗呢？

translation.en: [woman] He is using antibiotics, hormone therapy.
translation.zh: ‎他现在就是抗生素啊 激素啊

translation.en: [Wenhua] Did he get infected because he works in the hospital?
translation.zh: ‎他是因为在医院里工作被感染的吗？

translation.en: [woman] Yes. He works in outpatients.
-[Wenhua] Okay. -Thank you so much.
[Wenhua] Don't worry, it's my pleasure.
This must be hard for him. Take care of your family.
translation.zh: ‎他也辛苦了 你们家人注意

translation.en: Take care.
Her husband is already in a serious condition.
But I can see she is really positive.
translation.zh: ‎但是我看到她还是很坚强的

translation.en: [Wenhua] How will this all end?
I'm now worrying about the rest of the world.
translation.zh: ‎现在我担心的是全球其他的地方

translation.en: But no matter what,
until our city is back to normal and everyone is safe,
translation.zh:
‎在武汉回归正常
‎所有人都安全了之前

translation.en: I will keep volunteering and doing this work.
[Dr. Henderson in English] At night, I'm a doctor.
During the day, I'm a community activist and organizer.
translation.zh: ‎白天 我是社区活动家和组织者

translation.en: And I do a lot. Too much, as my wife would say.
translation.zh:
‎我做很多事
‎太多了 我太太这么说

translation.en: -Ain't you a doctor? -Yes.
-What hospital? -University of Miami.
I…I… I think you were my admitting doctor.
I probably was.
Thank you, sir.
-Thank you. -No problem.
[Dr. Henderson] The majority of people that we've been servicing outside
translation.zh: ‎我们在疫情期间开展这活动

translation.en: while we've been doing this work around the pandemic
have been middle-aged Black men.
I'll be back, okay?
-All right, doc. -All right.
[Dr. Henderson] We're seeing the unmasking of neglect
of these communities now being exacerbated by a crisis.
translation.zh: ‎我们看到 一场危机 ‎加剧曝露了对这些社区的忽视

translation.en: -[Dr. Henderson] How are you? -I'm good. How are you?
-Good. I'm Armen. -Tasha. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎（赈灾队） ‎-我是阿尔门
‎-塔莎 很高兴认识你

translation.en: -So you came to volunteer? -Yeah.
[Dr. Henderson] We opened up because people were complaining
translation.zh: ‎我们开放是因为人们在抱怨

translation.en: they don't have access to hand washing stations.
They were walking miles to go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: ‎他们必须步行数英里到浴室

translation.en: So we started the shower site, not only to serve them
translation.zh: ‎（社区卫生站） ‎所以我们启动了这个站 为他们服务

translation.en: but also to highlight what the government was not doing either.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们启动了这个站 为他们服务 ‎并突出政府没做的事情

translation.en: -All right. -Okay?
-[man] COVID is like a very hard test. -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎新冠肺炎就像一个非常艰难的测试

translation.en: It's very sad. You lose your place to live and that is the hardest part.
translation.zh: ‎这很可悲 失去住所是最难的部分

translation.en: Okay, you have my towel?
I got your towel. You have your toiletries.
translation.zh: ‎我拿了 还有你的洗漱用品

translation.en: Here. You gotta change this mask. It's old. It's not working.
translation.zh:
‎来 你必须换了这口罩
‎太旧了 起不了作用

translation.en: Here's a cloth one. You like flowers?
translation.zh: ‎这是布制的 你喜欢花吗？

translation.en: -Yes, I do. -It kind of matches.
-Thank you. -Okay.
People just expect you to wave a magic wand--
[Dr. Henderson] And fix it. In reality,
translation.zh: ‎解决问题 ‎实际上 我们只是在做县市该做的事

translation.en: we're just doing stuff that the county and the city should do.
translation.zh: ‎实际上 我们只是在做县市该做的事

translation.en: They should learn how treat people humanely.
The funny thing about this site is… that's downtown Miami.
translation.zh: ‎这个站有趣的是…那是迈阿密市中心

translation.en: Um, it's literally like two miles away from where we're standing right now…
translation.zh: ‎离我们现在站的地方有两英里

translation.en: but the life expectancy of people that live in downtown Miami
translation.zh:
‎但住在迈阿密市中心
‎的人们的预期寿命

translation.en: is literally 15 years more than it is than people that live
in Overtown proper.
So, it's like a finger prick, okay?
translation.zh: ‎这就像个手指刺 知道吗？

translation.en: As I said, this one is basically gonna tell us…
translation.zh:
‎正如我所说
‎这基本上会让我们知道…

translation.en: You all right?
…if you've been exposed to the virus over two weeks ago, okay?
translation.zh: ‎…如果你两周前接触过病毒 好吗？

translation.en: [Renata in Portuguese] My finger is very thin, careful not to go through it!
translation.zh: ‎我的手指很薄 小心不要刺穿它！

translation.en: Have you had symptoms?
-I have. -Which ones?
Sore throat, cough, diarrhea.
-Fifteen minutes, okay, Renata? -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-十五分钟 好吗 雷娜塔？
‎-好的

translation.en: We'll suffer now for 15 minutes.
If I'm pregnant, it's yours!
translation.zh: ‎如果我怀孕了 就是你的！

translation.en: [Renata] My condolences, dear.
Things are getting worse, I can imagine how you're feeling.
translation.zh: ‎情况越来越糟 我能想象你的感受

translation.en: [Renata] My phone has become the hotline for the whole community.
translation.zh: ‎我的手机成了全社区的热线

translation.en: Non-reactive.
Phew!
-Fucking lucky. -[laughs]
You can breathe now, Doctor, I'm not pregnant!
translation.zh: ‎你可以呼吸了 医生 我没怀孕！

translation.en: -You got lucky, it wasn't this time. -[cheering]
[Renata] We needed a private service,
because SAMU, the government ambulance service, doesn't come here.
translation.zh: ‎因为政府救护车服务不来这里

translation.en: This was possible because of a group of people coming together,
translation.zh: ‎这变成可能 因为一群人凝聚力量

translation.en: who made donations and helped us.
The government didn't help before,
and they were not going to during the pandemic.
Ask someone to wait for us, we're almost there.
translation.zh: ‎请人等我们 我们快到了

translation.en: He needs to find a parking spot.
[Renata] When they open their houses to us,
we realize that COVID is the least of the problems for some of the families.
translation.zh:
‎我们意识到 对某些家庭来说
‎新冠肺炎还不算大问题

translation.en: Turn her that way.
Which way with her head?
Okay, guys. Now take this here. Here's the handle.
translation.zh: ‎好 各位 现在拿这个 这是把手

translation.en: Hold it with the sheet so it doesn't break.
translation.zh: ‎用床单握住它 以免它破裂

translation.en: Careful here…
Watch her feet!
Everything will be fine. We'll take care of your kids, okay?
translation.zh:
‎一切都会好起来的
‎我们会照顾你的孩子 好吗？

translation.en: Go slow.
-Into the ambulance. -Where's the stretcher?
No stretcher! She doesn't go on a stretcher!
This is no joke. COVID is not a joke.
translation.zh:
‎这不是开玩笑
‎新冠肺炎不是笑话

translation.en: -Pull this way. -Wait!
Go there so we can balance.
translation.zh: ‎去那里 这样我们就能平衡了

translation.en: Where's her ID? It's not here.
It's in there. Calm down.
Thank you, Renata. I really appreciate it.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 雷纳塔 真的非常感激你

translation.en: Anything, call me.
[woman] Mom, I am here, okay? I am here for you.
translation.zh: ‎妈 我在这里 知道吗？我会陪着你

translation.en: [Hassan] I changed my profile picture to "Stay home, protect the NHS,"
translation.zh:
‎（留守在家
‎保护国民保健署） ‎我将我的个人资料图片
‎改为“留守在家 保护国民保健署”

translation.en: and that's the tweet.
Sixty-one thousand… Something like that.
I mean, it's not about numbers but it's great that I got this outreach
translation.zh: ‎这与数字无关 但我很高兴

translation.en: with the very important #StayHomeSaveLives
translation.zh:
‎可延申推广这很重要的
‎#留守在家拯救生命

translation.en: I put a link to the hospital I'm cleaning--
translation.zh:
‎我放了一个
‎我在清洁的医院的链接…

translation.en: For people to donate. It got loads of numbers.
translation.zh: ‎让人们捐款 它得到了大量捐款

translation.en: And then I also put another link to donate to Choose Love.
translation.zh:
‎我还放了另一个链接
‎捐款给“选择爱”

translation.en: -A charity that Farah works for. Right? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-法拉工作的慈善机构 对吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: This never happened, ever.
translation.zh: ‎这从来没发生过 从来没有

translation.en: [Hassan] One of the things in common between me and my colleagues at the hospital
translation.zh: ‎我和同事之间的共同点之一

translation.en: is that we were all not born in Britain.
translation.zh: ‎就是我们都不是在英国出生

translation.en: We live in Britain as refugees and migrants, and we come from over ten countries.
translation.zh:
‎我们以来自十多个国家
‎难民和移民的身份生活

translation.en: Those are the people who are keeping our hospitals running
translation.zh: ‎那些是维持我们医院运转的人

translation.en: and my story went viral.
So I want people to know about my colleagues
and that's why I'm photographing them and sharing their stories.
translation.zh: ‎所以我拍摄他们并分享他们的故事

translation.en: [Hassan] This is my colleague, Gimba.
She is the best woman I've ever met in my life.
translation.zh: ‎她是我一生中遇到的最好的女人

translation.en: Your girlfriend is going to chop your neck.
She's been working at the hospital for years now,
as a ward host, preparing food for patients.
translation.zh: ‎她是病房服务员 为病人准备食物

translation.en: [patient] Do you know where my telephone is?
My telephone. I need it.
[Hassan] Your telephone is here.
[patient] And the window open.
[Hassan] Window open. I was gonna open the window behind you.
translation.zh: ‎开窗口 我要打开你身后的窗

translation.en: Do you want me to charge your phone?
-No, it's charged. -[Hassan] It's charged. That's good.
translation.zh:
‎-不用 已经充好了
‎-充好了 很好

translation.en: [patient] Thank you.
[Gimba] Where's my tea? I'll drink my tea.
-You just dropped tea on the floor. -Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-你刚把茶倒在地板上
‎-对不起

translation.en: You just messed my floor. I just cleaned my floor.
translation.zh:
‎你刚把我的地板弄脏了
‎我刚打扫了地板

translation.en: You want me to choke? I'm taking my tea.
No, Gimba, please.
-Gimba's not talking anymore. -It's not easy.
translation.zh:
‎-金巴不再说话了
‎-没那么容易

translation.en: They found a body of a Nigerian nurse who died of COVID-19
translation.zh:
‎他们发现了一名
‎死于新冠肺炎的尼日利亚护士的尸体

translation.en: -in Brooklyn, New York. -She's a Nigerian nurse?
translation.zh:
‎-在纽约布鲁克林
‎-她是尼日利亚籍护士？

translation.en: Yes, she's a Nigerian but she's based in New York.
They say she was having the COVID-19 and she died at home.
translation.zh: ‎他们说她得了新冠肺炎 在家中死去

translation.en: I don't believe this story that they put on Facebook.
translation.zh: ‎我不相信他们放上脸书的故事

translation.en: I don't believe that story.
America is different than here.
So in Nigeria, if you don't have money, you can't treat yourself.
translation.zh:
‎在尼日利亚 如果你没钱
‎就不能得到医疗

translation.en: But when they say coronavirus entered Nigeria,
translation.zh: ‎但当他们说冠状病毒进入尼日利亚时

translation.en: the Nigerian government said, to get well, you can go to the hospital. It's free.
translation.zh:
‎尼日利亚政府说 要康复
‎你可以去医院 免费的

translation.en: In Syria, the government is bombing hospitals.
translation.zh: ‎在叙利亚 政府正在轰炸医院

translation.en: No. Why?
Because the hospitals, they have people who are from--
…who are against the regime.
They are being treated there.
So that's why they're bombing the hospitals.
That's why I always say, "God have mercy."
"Forgive us. Have mercy. Have mercy for your children."
translation.zh: ‎原谅我们 怜悯 怜悯祢的孩子

translation.en: "Have mercy for all over the world," because, this is terrible.
translation.zh: ‎怜悯全世界” 因为 这太可怕了

translation.en: I have never heard of this kind of sickness in my life.
translation.zh: ‎我一生中从未听说过这种病

translation.en: I've never heard this kind of sickness.
[Hassan] Gimba, cheer up. I don't like you to be sad.
translation.zh: ‎金巴 振作点 我不喜欢看到你难过

translation.en: -[Gimba] I'm not sad. I'm very angry. -Don't be angry. Why are you angry?
translation.zh: ‎我不难过 我很愤怒 ‎别生气 你为何生气？

translation.en: I'm very upset. It's not nice, what is happening.
translation.zh: ‎我非常沮丧 这不好 正在发生的事

translation.en: [female interviewer] Seeing as how the pandemic has implications
on our own mental health, can each of you share
translation.zh: ‎我们的心理健康 大家能不能分享

translation.en: how you've emphasized self-care in your own lives recently?
translation.zh: ‎最近你如何在生活中强调自我保健？

translation.en: I wear many hats in the community.
Um, in the hospital, I'm still full-time employed at University of Miami Hospital.
translation.zh:
‎在医院里 我仍然
‎在迈阿密大学医院全职工作

translation.en: Um, I'm also an organizer with Dream Defenders…
Um, and with so many crises going on at the same time,
it's just been really hard for me to actually figure out
when the best time is to worry about, like, my mental health,
translation.zh: ‎我该什么时候担心自己的心理健康

translation.en: but… the time that I feel like I'm… I'm best,
in terms of mental health, is when I'm spending time with my family.
translation.zh:
‎在心理健康方面
‎就是我和家人在一起的时候

translation.en: When I'm with my wife and kids.
translation.zh: ‎当我和妻子和孩子在一起的时候

translation.en: [girl] And very tasty.
[Dr. Henderson] And I can smile, I laugh and just I can forget about
translation.zh:
‎我可以微笑 我笑了
‎这样我可以暂时忘记

translation.en: what's going on, temporarily.
-Did I? -[mother] Yeah.
Is that what you did? You ate it?
[mother] She said "yeah."
[Dr. Henderson] Any time you have a breakdown in society like we've seen,
translation.zh: ‎每当发生如我们所见那样的社会崩溃

translation.en: there is a chance for us to… to build something better.
translation.zh: ‎我们就有机会建立更好的东西

translation.en: But there are also forces in the opposite direction.
[Dr. Henderson] I was racially profiled in front of my house.
translation.zh: ‎我在我家门前受到种族歧视

translation.en: The way I gauged the encounter is that he was trying to elicit a response from me,
translation.zh:
‎我评估这次遭遇的方式
‎是他试图引起我的回应

translation.en: and I'm really glad that I didn't react the way I should have.
translation.zh:
‎我真的很庆幸
‎我没有做出我应该有的反应

translation.en: Because I could have ended up tased, I could have ended up shot.
translation.zh: ‎因为我可能被电枪击倒 或被开枪

translation.en: He didn't have a mask on. You know, he's like irate.
translation.zh: ‎他没有戴口罩 看来被激怒了

translation.en: He's like spitting in my face, he's pointing in my face.
translation.zh: ‎他朝我脸上吐唾沫 指着我的脸

translation.en: My wife comes outside, she's able to de-escalate the situation
translation.zh: ‎我太太出来了 她缓和局势

translation.en: and get her ID to prove that we actually live there.
translation.zh:
‎并拿到她的身份证
‎以证明我们确实住在那里

translation.en: My daughter watches cartoons at the computer,
which is right next to our security camera, so she saw everything.
translation.zh:
‎就在我们的保安摄像头旁
‎所以她看到了一切

translation.en: Because of that, when we're in the car, even now,
translation.zh: ‎因此 当我们在车里 即使是现在

translation.en: and we see a police officer, she ducks down.
translation.zh: ‎我们看到警察时 她会低身躲起来

translation.en: She doesn't wanna… she doesn't wanna be seen by a police officer.
She thinks she's gonna get arrested for some reason.
translation.zh: ‎她认为她会因为某种原因被捕

translation.en: Um, and…
You know, at some point for a six-year-old to do something like that,
translation.zh:
‎在某个角度来说
‎一个六岁的孩子做这样的事

translation.en: to duck down because she thinks she's gonna be harmed by police,
translation.zh: ‎认为自己会受到警察的伤害而躲起来

translation.en: that's like robbing a child of their innocence.
translation.zh: ‎这就像剥夺了一个孩子的天真

translation.en: [Renata in Portuguese] At first, it's crazy how much I used to suffer.
translation.zh: ‎起初 我曾经受过的苦真是荒谬

translation.en: I was worried about how people would look at me
translation.zh: ‎我担心人们听了我的故事后

translation.en: after they'd heard my story.
But this was way back, right after I left jail.
translation.zh: ‎但这是过去 就在我离开监狱之后

translation.en: And I discovered something.
People don't want to see others doing something good.
You are stigmatized.
If you did something bad, people want you to stay the bad person
translation.zh:
‎如果你做了坏事
‎人们希望你仍然是那个坏人

translation.en: that they built in their heads, you know?
translation.zh: ‎那个他们脑海中幻想的坏人

translation.en: Because it challenges them.
How could someone who was in jail be helping others now?
translation.zh:
‎一个曾在监狱里的人
‎现在怎么能帮助别人？

translation.en: It's not possible.
It's as if it doesn't fit. It's like oil and water.
translation.zh: ‎好像不合适似的 就像油和水一样

translation.en: People do not accept it.
Especially when it's someone that comes from the favela, lived on the edge.
translation.zh: ‎特别是来自贫民窟 生活在边缘的人

translation.en: I'm no Mother Teresa just because I left jail and now I help people.
translation.zh:
‎我不会因为我离开监狱
‎现在帮助别人 而成了圣人

translation.en: It's the minimum that I have to do to earn my place.
translation.zh:
‎这是我为赢得地位
‎而做的最低限度的事

translation.en: This is regardless of whether I was in jail or not.
translation.zh: ‎这与我是否曾在监狱中无关

translation.en: The same applies to where Andy comes from.
The same as Andy, who is a nurse, Black,
translation.zh: ‎安迪也是 他是个黑人护士

translation.en: gay and married to another man.
translation.zh: ‎同性恋 和另一个男人结婚

translation.en: Oh, he's gonna cry! [laughs]
You know I'm a softie.
It's true to my feelings.
Sometimes I think, "What about when this ends?"
translation.zh: ‎有时我会想“这一切结束后呢？”

translation.en: -Will it ever end? -Will it?
What will we feel going back to normal?
translation.zh:
‎回到正常生活中的我们
‎会有什么感觉？

translation.en: It won't be possible. What is normal?
I can’t even remember what I was doing when I heard,
translation.zh:
‎我甚至不记得我听到
‎“大流行！停止一切！”时

translation.en: -"Pandemic! Stop everything!" -Exactly.
[in Spanish] Who's going to help? Because we need three surgeons.
translation.zh:
‎谁来帮忙？
‎因为我们需要三个外科医生

translation.en: You'll be in charge of the respiratory line.
I'll look for a tracheotomy connector.
translation.zh: ‎我去找一个气管切开连接器

translation.en: Dr. López. Can you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎卢佩斯医生 你能听到吗？

translation.en: I urgently need a bronchoscopy connector.
translation.zh: ‎我急需一个支气管镜连接器

translation.en: Hi. How are you, Aldair?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 你好吗 奥尔代尔？

translation.en: How are you?
We're going to help you because you cannot cough.
translation.zh: ‎我们会帮助你 因为你不能咳嗽

translation.en: We need to help you so you can breathe more easily, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我们会帮你
‎让你更轻松地呼吸 好吗？

translation.en: Did you explain it to his family?
Yes. I spoke with his mom.
-His poor mother. -His poor mother.
translation.zh:
‎-他可怜的妈妈
‎-他可怜的妈妈

translation.en: This must be maddening. He's only 15.
translation.zh: ‎这一定很可悲 他只有15岁

translation.en: What do you want to do?
-He wants to take that off. -No.
No!
Put your hand down.
Put your hand down.
Thank you.
Aldair, what team do you support?
translation.zh: ‎奥尔代尔 你支持哪支球队？

translation.en: "Alianza Lima?"
-The "U"? -The "U"?
The "U"? Come on, really?
Yeah.
There are moments when the number of requests is overwhelming.
[sniffles] It's horrible.
It's like…
when you watch the film Titanic,
translation.zh: ‎当你观看电影《泰坦尼克号》时

translation.en: when the lifeboats leave…
and you know what's going to happen to those who stay.
translation.zh: ‎而你知道留下来的人会发生什么事

translation.en: [woman in Farsi] Hello, my dear.
Hello, Shohreh, dear. It's me, Sara.
translation.zh: ‎你好 索瑞 亲爱的 是我 莎拉

translation.en: [Shohreh] Sara, my dear. How are you?
translation.zh: ‎莎拉 亲爱的 你好吗？

translation.en: [crying] Oh, my love. My love. So many condolences.
translation.zh: ‎我的爱 亲爱的 请节哀顺便

translation.en: [crying] Did you see how he flew away like a bird?
translation.zh: ‎你看到他像鸟一样飞走了吗？

translation.en: Did you see how innocently he left?
translation.zh: ‎你看到他是多么无辜地离开了吗？

translation.en: -My love. -Uncle, the quiet and gentle.
translation.zh:
‎-我的爱
‎-叔叔 文静温柔的

translation.en: That same kind uncle who was quiet and gentle
translation.zh: ‎那个安静 温柔又单纯的叔叔

translation.en: and innocent, he was always innocent.
[crying] He was always innocent.
Always. He went without any--
translation.zh: ‎一直都是 他没留下任何…

translation.en: And he left us all alone and helpless.
Left the world and all its things…
This world is crazy. And it's brought us to our knees.
translation.zh: ‎这世界是疯狂的 它使我们屈膝

translation.en: He is at peace and at rest in the best place.
translation.zh: ‎他在和平中 安息在最好的地方

translation.en: Goodbye, my dear.
A really kind and good man.
-Goodbye, my dear. All my love. -Goodbye.
translation.zh:
‎-再见 亲爱的 献上我所有的爱
‎-再见

translation.en: [whispers] Oh, my love.
[girl singing in English] ♪ Only you ♪
♪ Can make this world seem right ♪
translation.zh: ‎才能使这个世界看起来美好

translation.en: ♪ Only you ♪
♪ Can make the darkness bright ♪
♪ Only you and you alone ♪
♪ Can thrill me like you do ♪
[man] By the power of your love and commitment--
[woman] I now pronounce you husband and wife.
You may kiss your betrothed!
♪ …for only you ♪
Does it taste good?
Yeah.
♪ Only you ♪
-Okay! -[they laugh]
♪ Can make this change in me ♪
♪ For it's true ♪
♪ You are my destiny ♪
translation.zh: ‎你是生命赐予我的 ‎（我很爱你 我们只想说…）

translation.en: She's so sweet. She's so precious.
translation.zh: ‎她真可爱 她是那么的珍贵

translation.en: I miss you so much… that words are not enough to say it.
translation.zh:
‎我非常想念你…
‎言语也不足以形容

translation.en: [crying] I love you, honey. Love you.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你 亲爱的 爱你

translation.en: ♪ You're my dream come true ♪
♪ My one and only you ♪
[woman] Could you all-- Just gather around in a big circle
leaving space for the morning briefing, please?
translation.zh: ‎请为上午的简报留出空间 好吗？

translation.en: Vaccination visit for Group Four, under-55s:
translation.zh: ‎第四组 55岁以下的疫苗接种访问

translation.en: They'll be groups of five patients coming through
every 20 minutes starting at half past eight.
Within this study, we are comparing the, um,
translation.zh: ‎在这项研究中 我们正在比较… ‎（詹妮弗艾莉森 研究护士经理）

translation.en: coronavirus vaccine alongside a control,
which is an approved safe, meningitis vaccine.
translation.zh: ‎是个批准安全的脑膜炎疫苗

translation.en: So, a certain percentage of participants today
will receive the Oxford coronavirus vaccine.
And then the other group will receive the meningitis vaccine.
translation.zh: ‎然后另一组将接受脑膜炎疫苗

translation.en: We're gonna give you a vaccine here. Are you normally all right with vaccines?
translation.zh:
‎我们会给你打疫苗
‎你打疫苗没问题吧？

translation.en: I think so, yeah.
-Yeah? Okay. -Yeah. [laughs]
-Are you feeling well today? -Find out. Yeah.
-Do you have any allergies at all? -No.
You might have some general aches and pains.
You might have some redness or swelling.
-That's to be expected. -Yeah. Okay.
-All right? -Yeah.
-Well done. -Okay.
[man] Is it possible we have a working vaccine by the end of this year?
translation.zh:
‎我们有可能在今年
‎年底之前研制出有效的疫苗吗？

translation.en: The only way we're gonna find out is by doing the large phase three trials
translation.zh:
‎找出答案的唯一方法
‎是进行大型第三阶段试验

translation.en: and wait for people to be infected
as part of that trial before we know if the vaccine can work.
translation.zh:
‎作为试验的一部分
‎才能知道疫苗是否有效

translation.en: This is a first step along the way towards getting that result in the future.
translation.zh: ‎这是在未来获得成果的第一步

translation.en: So, it's possible, but we certainly can't guarantee it.
translation.zh: ‎所以 有可能 但我们当然不能保证

translation.en: What's going to make a difference is using the vaccine,
not just having the vaccine and knowing the efficacy result
translation.zh: ‎不仅仅是拥有它 知道功效结果

translation.en: but really getting lots of people vaccinated.
If you've got more than 7.5 billion people,
most of whom will need a vaccine,
translation.zh: ‎他们大多数都需要接种疫苗

translation.en: the most ambitious program of supply is ours with AstraZeneca,
translation.zh:
‎最雄心勃勃的供应计划
‎就是我们 用阿斯利康

translation.en: who are targeting two billion doses in 12 months.
translation.zh: ‎目标是在十二个月内注射二十亿剂

translation.en: Two billion doses, that's still not enough.
[Prof. Gilbert] It was very important to the university
that we were able to work with a partner
who was going to supply the world with the vaccine
and not just a few high income countries.
translation.zh: ‎而不仅是提供给几个高收入国家

translation.en: [woman] Vaccination is very different than a vaccine.
So having the system in place and the plans in place,
translation.zh:
‎系统到位 计划到位… ‎（玛丽亚范克霍夫医生
‎世卫组织 新冠肺炎技术负责人）

translation.en: so that vaccination can take place, is what's really, really critical.
translation.zh:
‎（玛丽亚范克霍夫医生
‎世卫组织 新冠肺炎技术负责人） ‎…以便进行疫苗接种
‎这是至关重要的

translation.en: For a better outcome, you don't do it alone.
translation.zh:
‎为了获得更好的结果
‎你不能独自完成

translation.en: You bring all those who can contribute and push together.
translation.zh: ‎要把所有能做出贡献的人聚集在一起

translation.en: People need to see. If we say it's going to be fair, and we plan it to be fair,
translation.zh:
‎人们必须看见 ‎如果我们说这将是公平的
‎那么它就必须是公平的

translation.en: then it needs to be fair.
translation.zh:
‎（迈克尔瑞恩医生 执行董事
‎世卫组织卫生紧急计划）

translation.en: And… And that's the real test of the global community.
translation.zh:
‎（迈克尔瑞恩医生 执行董事
‎世卫组织卫生紧急计划） ‎这是对全球社会的真正考验

translation.en: Because there are other forces at play.
translation.zh: ‎因为还有其他力量在起作用

translation.en: And if you're constantly undermining the very institutions
that need to give people reassurance,
then you need to ask who's undermining these institutions?
translation.zh: ‎那么要找出是谁在破坏这些机构？

translation.en: [male reporter] As case numbers escalate,
Donald Trump has turned his anger on the WHO,
translation.zh:
‎唐纳德特朗普
‎已将他的愤怒转向了世卫组织

translation.en: holding them responsible for the worsening crisis in the US.
translation.zh: ‎要他们对美国日益恶化的危机负责

translation.en: [Trump] Today, I'm instructing my administration
to halt funding of the World Health Organization
while a review is conducted to assess
the World Health Organization's role in severely mismanaging--
translation.zh: ‎世界卫生组织严重管理不善…

translation.en: [Dr. Tedros] I have been attacked, racist attacks.
translation.zh: ‎我受到了攻击 种族主义攻击

translation.en: And my colleagues have been attacked, death threats.
translation.zh: ‎而我的同事也遭到攻击 死亡威胁

translation.en: Even yesterday, by the way.
translation.zh: ‎顺便说一句 昨天也这样

translation.en: We don't mind about that. We don't care about ourselves.
translation.zh: ‎我们不介意 我们不在乎自己

translation.en: We care about our world because people are dying.
translation.zh:
‎我们关心我们的世界
‎因为人们正在死去

translation.en: Do you know what we say in WHO?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我们在世卫组织说什么吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] We say we need vaccines for COVID…
translation.zh: ‎我们说我们需要新冠肺炎的疫苗

translation.en: but we don't have vaccines for misguided nationalism,
translation.zh: ‎却没有针对被误导的民族主义的疫苗

translation.en: don't have vaccines for inequality, no vaccines for poverty.
translation.zh:
‎没有解决不平等的疫苗
‎也没有解决贫困的疫苗

translation.en: Unless… we address the problems
we have already identified as WHO…
the lack of national unity and lack of global solidarity,
any differences could be exploited by the virus.
translation.zh: ‎任何差异都会让病毒乘隙而入

translation.en: And that… we have to fight this virus in unison.
translation.zh:
‎因此…我们必须
‎齐心协力对抗这种病毒

translation.en: [Renata] Turn right here.
There, where those people are. Get out of the way, kid!
translation.zh: ‎那里 那些人哪里 走开 孩子！

translation.en: Here, come on in.
You can bring the stretcher.
Bring the stretcher.
-Was she responsive? -Yes, she was.
-Did she pass out just now? -Not now. About ten minutes ago.
translation.zh:
‎-她是否刚昏过去？
‎-不是 大约十分钟前

translation.en: -Where's the stretcher? -It's coming.
Let's take her now. I need her ID.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在就带她走
‎我需要她的身份证

translation.en: People, move!
Careful.
-Who is coming with her? -She is. Her sister.
translation.zh:
‎-谁会跟着来？
‎-她会 是她的妹妹

translation.en: [Renata] Move, come on!
We'll go back to check on her mother, and then we… Okay? Her mother?
translation.zh:
‎我们回去看她妈妈 然后我们…
‎好吗？她妈妈？

translation.en: -SAMU should see her. -Ricardo, why are we here?
translation.zh:
‎-流动急诊服务应该去看她
‎-里卡多 我们为什么在这里？

translation.en: -SAMU takes too long. -Forget SAMU, it's on us.
translation.zh:
‎-流动急诊服务要等很久
‎-别管流动急诊服务 包在我们身上

translation.en: They come for a single call and just leave.
Look at SAMU leaving there.
translation.zh: ‎看 流动急诊服务刚要离开

translation.en: I told you. They only came and turned around.
translation.zh: ‎我说过了 他们只来转一圈就走

translation.en: -[man] They've left? -[woman] Of course.
[Renata] SAMU doesn't help us.
translation.zh: ‎流动急诊服务没有帮助我们

translation.en: -Where? -They're gone.
-[Renata] She was very anxious. -[woman] Her blood pressure was bad.
-Do you have your phone to get my number? -[woman] It's charging.
translation.zh:
‎-你有电话记下我的号码吗？
‎-在充电

translation.en: [Renata] I'll write it on some paper for you.
Hello. We're back.
-It's for you to calm down. -Are you hypertensive or diabetic?
translation.zh:
‎-这个会让你冷静下来
‎-你是否患有高血压或糖尿病？

translation.en: I have diabetes.
Recently, I lost a sister,
translation.zh: ‎最近 我失去了一个姐姐

translation.en: and my nephew died,
all within the last seven months.
Two months, I think. I lost a sister and a nephew.
translation.zh:
‎我想两个月内
‎我失去了一个姐姐和侄子

translation.en: -[man] Look after yourself. -Now this.
May God be with you. You need to be okay and stay calm.
translation.zh:
‎愿神与你同在
‎你必须安好并保持冷静

translation.en: -Okay, my love. -Everything is going to be all right.
translation.zh:
‎-好 我的爱
‎-一切都会好的

translation.en: Okay.
[Renata] My mother was my world.
My mother died eight months after my brother died,
translation.zh:
‎在我哥哥去世八个月后
‎我母亲去世了

translation.en: and it was crazy because I was there with her.
translation.zh: ‎这很疯狂 因为当时我和她在一起

translation.en: My mother fell ill and I called for help.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈病倒了 我打电话求救

translation.en: But it took too long to arrive, because it was a weekend.
translation.zh: ‎但是等待时间太长了 因为是周末

translation.en: It was Carnival. The streets were closed…
and the rescue took too long.
I'm not saying that my mother died because of the delay in the assistance,
translation.zh: ‎我不是说我妈妈因为援助延误而去世

translation.en: but there's a possibility that she wouldn't have died.
It was very complicated. It still affects me a lot.
translation.zh: ‎这很复杂 它对我影响仍然很大

translation.en: And I don't want others to lose their loved ones.
translation.zh: ‎而我不希望其他人失去他们的爱人

translation.en: It's difficult. It's complicated.
This is one reason why I'm doing what I'm doing today.
translation.zh: ‎这就是如今我做这事的原因之一

translation.en: -[in English] How are you, my dear? -I'm not good. I'm just--
translation.zh: ‎你还好吗 亲爱的？ ‎不好 我…

translation.en: I couldn't sleep.
So, what did your son say to you when he called you earlier?
translation.zh: ‎你儿子之前打电话给你时说了什么？

translation.en: He's upset.
[Hassan] Upset?
Yeah, very upset.
[Hassan] Of course. He wants to see his mum.
Well, I want to see him, too, but I don't know when I'll go home.
translation.zh:
‎我也想见他
‎但不知道什么时候可以回家

translation.en: [Hassan] I know.
[patient] I don't know if I'll go home.
[in Arabic] Hello, how are you?
Hello.
What's up?
All good, how about you?
Thank God, all good. We're fine. How are you doing?
translation.zh:
‎感谢神 一切都好
‎我们很好 你好吗？

translation.en: We're fine.
What are you up to?
Your mother is making Fatteh.
Oh, how I crave Fatteh!
It's easy to make.
I made Makloubeh yesterday. It was delicious.
translation.zh: ‎我昨天做了马克卢贝 很美味

translation.en: -I hope you enjoyed it. Was it good? -Yes, it was good.
translation.zh:
‎-希望你吃得开心 好吃吗？
‎-是的 很好吃

translation.en: I'm glad you enjoyed it.
Farah kept eating until she fell on her face.
translation.zh: ‎法拉一直吃到直到她倒在地上

translation.en: The rice wasn't very fatty. I hoped it would be greasier.
translation.zh: ‎米饭不是很肥 我希望它会更油腻

translation.en: It needs ghee.
Where's mom? Let me talk to her for a bit.
-Hello, darling! -How are you?
Bon appetit.
I miss you.
I miss you too.
What's up?
-All good. -Thank God, everything is good.
God bless you.
May God bless you.
Darling. How are you?
Not much new. Everyone is working today.
translation.zh: ‎没什么新消息 今天大家都在工作

translation.en: Your sister invited us round. We made Qatayef to take over.
translation.zh:
‎你姐姐这次邀请我们过去
‎我们做了卡塔耶夫带过去

translation.en: We're going to her place now.
Okay, go eat. I won't take up your time.
translation.zh: ‎好 去吃吧 我不会耽误你的时间

translation.en: -Okay, darling. I will call you. -Okay, darling.
translation.zh:
‎-好 亲爱的 我会打给你
‎-好 亲爱的

translation.en: -Goodbye. -Goodbye.
-Goodbye, Son. -Goodbye, Dad.
translation.zh:
‎-再见 儿子
‎-再见 爸爸

translation.en: [woman] Hi, we're here out on the 11th Street overpass
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我们在第11街立交桥上

translation.en: where the City of Miami is breaking down tents.
translation.zh: ‎迈阿密市政局正在这里拆除帐篷

translation.en: I want to make it clear that CDC guidelines at this time,
translation.zh:
‎我想澄清
‎此时疾病控制中心的指导方针

translation.en: indicate that for Public Health measures,
encampments should not be disturbed.
Hey. We got reports that they were breaking down people's tents here?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我们收到报告
‎说他们正在拆毁人们的帐篷？

translation.en: -We're gonna have tents tomorrow. -Okay. He needs one.
translation.zh:
‎-我们明天就会有帐篷了
‎-好 他需要一个

translation.en: Yeah, if you want to talk at the press conference--
translation.zh: ‎是 如果你想在新闻发布会上发言…

translation.en: -I want to. -Yeah. Okay. All right.
-What's your name? -Keith Williams.
translation.zh:
‎-你叫什么名字？
‎-基思威廉姆斯

translation.en: All right, do you want to do a video now?
translation.zh: ‎好 现在你想拍个视频吗？

translation.en: -That we could post on social media? -If you want to.
translation.zh:
‎-让我们放上社交媒体？
‎-你要的话

translation.en: Okay. So you just tell us what happened and--
translation.zh:
‎好 你就告诉我们
‎发生什么事 然后…

translation.en: They put us in a shelter.
-Which happened ten, twenty times. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这发生了十多 二十次了
‎-是

translation.en: -There's no help. -Okay…
[Dr. Henderson] The same individuals that I meet and I see on the streets,
translation.zh: ‎我在街上遇到和看到的那些人

translation.en: I see my dad, I see my brother.
translation.zh: ‎就好像看见我爸爸 我哥哥

translation.en: My dad definitely spent the majority of the years
translation.zh: ‎和我妈妈分手后 我爸爸

translation.en: after my mom broke up in unstable housing,
translation.zh:
‎肯定在不稳定的住处中
‎度过了大部分时间

translation.en: and my brother, the same thing.
You okay? Did they say you had a concussion or something?
translation.zh:
‎你还好吗？
‎他们有没有说你有脑震荡之类的？

translation.en: -How is it doing? -It's alright.
-You want me to take a look at it? -Well…
Let me see.
Oh, wow, what did they hit you with?
It looks to be healing okay, actually.
-When's the last time you took a shower? -Day before yesterday.
translation.zh:
‎-你最后一次沐浴是什么时候？
‎-前天

translation.en: Why don't you come by so we can change the bandage?
-You got clothes? -Yeah.
That's what I'm saying. Can you come today?
translation.zh: ‎这就是我要说的 你今天能来吗？

translation.en: Can you make sure he gets down there? I want him to get down there.
[Dr. Henderson] COVID-19 exacerbated all the bad things about… America.
translation.zh:
‎新冠肺炎加剧了
‎所有关于美国的丑事

translation.en: Are you okay? You sure?
I don't think we could have imagined that we'd be here like this today.
translation.zh:
‎我想我们无法想象
‎我们今天会走到这一步

translation.en: Did they tell you about the hurricane coming?
translation.zh: ‎他们有没有告诉你飓风来了？

translation.en: You didn't even know.
[Dr. Henderson] With what's going on in crisis and the economic downturn that we had,
translation.zh:
‎随着危机中发生的事
‎和我们所经历的经济衰退

translation.en: and the way that affects the Black and Brown communities,
translation.zh: ‎以及对黑和棕色人种社区的影响

translation.en: you could be next.
"What if I lose my house?" There's always some sort of nagging…
translation.zh:
‎“万一我失去我的住所呢？”
‎总有一些唠叨…

translation.en: questions in the back of my mind.
I want to make sure I don't end up in the same situation, but also…
translation.zh:
‎我想确保我不会陷入同样的境地
‎但同时…

translation.en: if I do, I want to make sure that I'm prepared for whatever is to come.
translation.zh:
‎如果我遇上了 我想确保
‎我为即将到来的一切做好准备

translation.en: [Mohit in Hindi] Where are your COVID patients?
On the seventh?
The labor room is also on the seventh floor?
-[woman] No, it's on the fifth. -Fifth floor.
-[Mohit] You want to sit? -[Nupur] Distancing?
[Nupur] I'm getting breathless.
[doctor] Don't worry. Be comfortable.
Relax. Height, weight and…
translation.zh: ‎放轻松 身高 体重还有…

translation.en: [Nupur] I'm having palpitations.
[Mohit] Do you see any clotting or not?
[doctor] See, right now there is no clot inside.
Placenta is absolutely fine and
that clot must have been resolved by now.
[Nupur] Since last week, I've been feeling a little slower.
translation.zh: ‎从上周开始 我感觉有点慢了

translation.en: [doctor] A little bit of concern is growth.
You are lagging behind by one week and three days.
So, growth is… Basically, we have a little bit of a concern.
translation.zh:
‎所以 增长是…
‎基本上 我们有点担心

translation.en: MORGUE
[man in Spanish] I never thought it would happen to my father.
translation.zh: ‎我从没想过这会发生在我父亲身上

translation.en: This disease took my father's life.
translation.zh: ‎这场病夺去了我父亲的生命

translation.en: [crying] He'll become an angel for me and my family.
translation.zh: ‎他会成为我和我家人的天使

translation.en: Everyone, please look after yourselves. Truly, be cautious.
translation.zh: ‎大家请照顾好自己 真的 要谨慎

translation.en: Arévalo needs to be intubated.
-[nurse] Who? -Arévalo.
-We need to inform them. -[Dr. Lopez] I did it already.
translation.zh:
‎-我们必须通知他们
‎-我已经通知了

translation.en: Dr. Ceci, I wanted to consult with you about a delicate topic,
translation.zh:
‎塞西医生
‎我想和你商量一件伤脑筋的事

translation.en: more of a human concern rather than something technical.
translation.zh: ‎比较是人道问题 不是技术问题

translation.en: My colleague Dr. Vázquez…
it's been brutal, so brutal.
He's dying.
And we want to give his family the opportunity to see him,
at least to see him from a distance.
It's so painful. He's one of us.
translation.zh: ‎真的太痛苦了 他是我们一员

translation.en: So young, 43 years old.
[in English] Albert was like… "Patient number 18 is gone," and I--
translation.zh:
‎阿尔伯特就说…
‎“18号病人走了”然后我…

translation.en: I said, "Oh, gone! I wasn't--"
I was happy because she was really struggling, and I said,
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴 因为她真的很挣扎 我说

translation.en: "I'm glad that she went home."
He's like, "No, Hassan, you should know now
translation.zh: ‎他说“不 哈桑 如今你该知道

translation.en: that when we say 'gone,' it means gone."
So, I had to walk in to get the rubbish trolley back into the room.
translation.zh:
‎所以 我不得不走进去
‎把垃圾车送回房

translation.en: And… you can tell when someone is dead,
translation.zh:
‎还有…你可以知道
‎什么时候有人死了

translation.en: because they close the curtains around them…
and I could hear the…
I could hear the…
the plastic being wrapped around her by the nurses.
She's died. She's dead.
[Hassan] I could see the signs, I could see the symptoms of a crisis.
translation.zh: ‎我可以看到迹象和危机的征兆

translation.en: We were not ready for it.
Because we have invested our time and energy to fight one another.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们已投入了
‎时间和精力来互相争斗

translation.en: I have a phobia from hospitals. [laughs]
I hate-- I mean--
Basically, I was tortured in a prison. I was in 215.
translation.zh:
‎基本上 我在监狱里被虐待
‎当时我在215

translation.en: 215 is military intelligence.
It's one of the most notorious secret police stations in Syria.
translation.zh:
‎它是叙利亚
‎最臭名昭著的秘密警察局之一

translation.en: And after three days of being there, my arms got really swollen because of--
translation.zh:
‎在那里待了三天后
‎我的胳膊肿得厉害 因为…

translation.en: because both of my wrists were smashed and this was broken here.
translation.zh:
‎因为我的两个手腕都被砸碎了
‎这个在这里断了

translation.en: My arm was broken in another-- Right here.
And my left leg suffered a lot because of--
translation.zh: ‎我的左腿受了很多伤 因为…

translation.en: I got electrocuted and beaten up, so it got really swollen,
translation.zh: ‎我被电击和殴打 所以它肿了

translation.en: and it became very dark, very-- Like, it was black.
So after three days, they figured they should take me to the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎三天后 他们认为应该带我去医院

translation.en: So they put a bin bag over my head and they taped the bin bag,
translation.zh:
‎他们把一个袋子套在我头上
‎并用胶带粘住袋子

translation.en: and then they put me in a car, but because I know Damascus by the--
translation.zh:
‎然后他们把我放在车里
‎但因为我知道大马士革…

translation.en: I know Damascus very well, so I knew where I was.
translation.zh:
‎我对大马士革了如指掌
‎所以我知道自己在哪里

translation.en: I knew where they took me. They took me to… the military hospital.
translation.zh:
‎我知道他们带我去哪里
‎他们带我去了军人医院

translation.en: And when I was there, as soon as they walked me in,
I was being slapped and punched from everywhere
translation.zh: ‎我就受到来自四面八方的刮掌和拳打

translation.en: from the clinical staff as well, because, obviously, I'm a protester.
translation.zh:
‎医疗人员也一样打我
‎因为 显然 我是一名抗议者

translation.en: So, I'm… one of the bad guys.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我是…其中一个坏人

translation.en: They took me outside, put me in another room.
translation.zh: ‎他们带我到外面 放我在另一个房间

translation.en: I was in so much pain, and I said,
"Please look at my left leg. Like, just check it out."
translation.zh: ‎“请看看我的左腿 只要检查一下”

translation.en: And they had a glance and then they said--
That's exactly what he said, the nurse.
translation.zh: ‎这正是他所说的 那个护士

translation.en: He said, "Oh…" [tutting]
"Abu Ali, get the amputation tools."
translation.zh: ‎阿布阿里 去拿截肢工具”

translation.en: I used to run marathons back then, so, I didn't-- [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎我以前经常跑马拉松
‎所以 我不要…

translation.en: Like, I didn't want to lose my leg.
So, I got--
At that point, I started moving very frantically.
translation.zh: ‎在那时候 我开始非常疯狂地移动

translation.en: And I said… [chuckles]
"Let's just think about this before you amputate anything."
translation.zh: ‎“在你截肢之前 再考虑清楚

translation.en: "Let's just have a chat, please."
I just wanted to have a chat with everyone. [laughing, crying]
[sniffles] And then, after five minutes of me crying
translation.zh: ‎然后 在我哭了五分钟之后

translation.en: and pleading for them not to chop off my leg they…
translation.zh: ‎并恳求他们不要砍断我的腿…

translation.en: They said, "Oh, we're joking with you."
translation.zh: ‎他们说“噢 我们跟你开玩笑”

translation.en: And they gave me some antibiotics.
But after I was released, the doctor who operated on my leg he said,
translation.zh: ‎我被释放后 给我腿动手术的医生说

translation.en: "If you stayed one another week you would have lost your leg."
translation.zh:
‎“如果你再待多一个星期
‎你会失去你的腿”

translation.en: So, yeah. [laughs] I hate hospitals.
translation.zh: ‎所以 就这样 我讨厌医院

translation.en: [man in Spanish] They say that he passed away.
Wow, when?
The issue is covering his shift.
And tomorrow there is another doctor absent.
Nino, because he's ill.
Please, Doctor, do me a favor. I'm at COVID right now.
translation.zh:
‎求求你 医生 帮我一个忙
‎现在我在新冠肺炎区

translation.en: Could you please call Belén to find a way to replace them?
translation.zh:
‎你能打电话给贝伦
‎想办法替代他们吗？

translation.en: Otherwise you won't have staff tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎否则明天你就没有医护人员了

translation.en: Doctor. Doctor.
Doctor. Another doctor over there.
translation.zh: ‎医生 另一个医生在那边

translation.en: In total here, there are seven doctors intubated.
translation.zh: ‎这里总共有七名医生插管了

translation.en: This shit is going to get us all.
-[in Portuguese] What's this alley called? -Tavares Alley.
translation.zh:
‎这条巷子叫什么？ ‎-塔瓦雷斯巷
‎-好

translation.en: Okay.
-[man] Do you have asthmatic bronchitis? -[woman] I do.
translation.zh:
‎-你有哮喘性支气管炎吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: -[man] Do you use an inhaler? -[woman] No.
[man] What do use when you have an attack?
My mom said she'd buy an inhaler, but she can't afford one.
translation.zh:
‎我妈妈说她会买一个吸入器
‎但她买不起

translation.en: [Renata] My worry is not when this pandemic will end…
translation.zh:
‎我担心的
‎不是这种流行病何时会结束

translation.en: but when will all the other pandemics end?
translation.zh: ‎而是其他大流行病何时会结束？

translation.en: [in English] Right now, I'm in Overtown.
The tropical storm has been upgraded to a hurricane.
There are tornado warnings.
The City of Miami or the county,
as I've been told by individuals, no one came to offer them shelter.
translation.zh:
‎正如一些人告诉我
‎没有人给他们提供庇护

translation.en: No one offered them a temporary place to stay or an evacuation route.
translation.zh: ‎没人为他们提供临时住所或疏散路线

translation.en: [in Spanish] I have kids. I'm exposing myself to the virus.
translation.zh: ‎我有孩子 我让自己暴露在病毒之下

translation.en: When I spoke to the security,
he said that we all have the virus, and are going to die.
translation.zh: ‎他说我们都有病毒 并且要死了

translation.en: That's their security person.
Mamá.
[Dr. Lopez in Spanish] I have a headache,
my throat hurts, and I have a fever.
translation.zh: ‎我的喉咙很痛 我还发烧

translation.en: I'm scared.
[man on TV in English] Each death serves as a reminder
translation.zh: ‎每一次死亡都提醒我们的决心要坚定

translation.en: that we must stand firm in our resolve.
translation.zh: ‎每一次死亡都提醒我们的决心要坚定 ‎（冠状病毒：唐宁街简报）

translation.en: Sadly, these deaths figures include NHS colleagues
translation.zh:
‎（冠状病毒：唐宁街简报） ‎可悲的是 这些死亡数字
‎包括国民保健署的同事

translation.en: and colleagues who work in social care.
translation.zh: ‎和从事社会关怀工作的同事

translation.en: They dedicated their lives to caring for others.
Today, I'm able to announce
that the government is setting up a life assurance scheme
translation.zh: ‎政府正在设立一个人寿保险计划

translation.en: for NHS and social care frontline colleagues.
translation.zh: ‎给国民保健署和社会关怀前线同事

translation.en: We want to do everything that we can
to support families who are dealing with this grief.
[Hassan] So, the government, they said that NHS staff,
translation.zh: ‎所以 政府说国民健保署医护人员

translation.en: if they die, their family will be given indefinite leave to remain.
translation.zh:
‎如果去世了
‎他们的家人将获得无限期居留许可

translation.en: -They will be given indefinite stay-- -Invulnerabilities.
translation.zh:
‎-他们将获得无限期居留许可…
‎-不会受伤害

translation.en: Except cleaners and porters…
and ward hosts and social care workers.
translation.zh: ‎以及病房服务员和社会关怀工作者

translation.en: So, essentially, if a migrant worker dies fighting the pandemic,
translation.zh:
‎所以 基本上
‎如果一个移民员工死于抗击疫情

translation.en: their families get nothing. They could also be at risk of deportation.
translation.zh:
‎他们的家人将一无所获
‎他们可能会面临被驱逐出境的风险

translation.en: And we're not talking about one or two people here,
we're talking about thousands, if not tens of thousands of people,
translation.zh: ‎这是数千人 甚至是数万人

translation.en: the bedrock of the NHS.
And I'm genuinely struggling to see how this is fair.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很想知道这有多么公平

translation.en: -It's not fair -It's not nice.
It's unfair that doctors and nurses are treated differently.
translation.zh: ‎医生和护士被区别对待是不公平的

translation.en: And we do the same thing.
Without porters, they can't operate.
translation.zh: ‎没有搬运工 他们就无法操作

translation.en: If you don't clean here, you would smell it.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不清理这里 你会闻到的

translation.en: We are closer… to the disease than the doctors and everybody,
translation.zh:
‎我们比医生和每个人
‎更接近…疾病

translation.en: because we are cleaning the bed, we are cleaning the whole--
translation.zh: ‎因为我们会打扫床 清理整个…

translation.en: the disease the patients have.
It's so sad, because they don't care about us.
translation.zh: ‎病人带着的疾病 ‎太可悲了 因为他们不理我们

translation.en: We are the low-key workers.
They don't care about us, it's not fair.
translation.zh: ‎他们不理我们 真的不公平

translation.en: [Renata in Portuguese] To the government, we don't exist.
translation.zh: ‎对政府来说 我们不存在

translation.en: We are cheap labor, that's all.
translation.zh: ‎我们是廉价劳工 仅此而已

translation.en: [male reporter] Brazil has recorded the highest number of deaths
translation.zh: ‎巴西创下历史新高在24小时以内

translation.en: from coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
Total cases are now at almost half a million.
[Renata] The pandemic is not the problem.
The pandemic was just another factor
that added to what the people on the margins already have to live with.
translation.zh: ‎已无法忍受之生活的另一个因素

translation.en: [woman on the phone] I was hospitalized, so was my husband.
I went back home, but unfortunately my husband didn't have the same chance
translation.zh: ‎我回家了 可惜我丈夫没有同样机会

translation.en: and ended up passing away.
It's been very difficult for me.
Close ones are losing the battle.
[Renata] We are not angry. We are outraged.
translation.zh: ‎我们不生气 我们很愤怒

translation.en: -[woman in English] Check his right-- -[man 1] No, check his pulse.
translation.zh:
‎-检查他的右…
‎-不 检查他的脉搏
